class.name: SteamMultiplayerPeer
class.brief_description: A MultiplayerPeer implementation that provides a bridge between Steam Networking Sockets and Godot's high level [MultiplayerAPI].
class.description: A MultiplayerPeer implementation that provides a bridge between Steam Networking Sockets and Godot's high level multiplayer API. Should be passed to [MultiplayerAPI].multiplayer_peer after being initialized by calling [create_lobby] or [connect_lobby].

method.name: get_steam64_from_peer_id
method.description: Converts peer ID of MultiplayerAPI's current multiplayer_peer into Steam user ID.

method.name: get_peer_id_from_steam64
method.description: Converts Steam user ID into peer ID of MultiplayerAPI's current multiplayer_peer.

signal.name: lobby_created
signal.description: Gets after creating a lobby and a game server. A good moment to assign the peer to [MultiplayerAPI] by calling multiplayer.set_multiplayer_peer().
